channel.title: Posts on Notepadium
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Notepadium

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Casting a wide net… into the Abyss When we think of buildings, we think of blocks of material piped into a form. Crushed out of air, planked into a superdrive. Calm down, she said. Crushed into overdrive… I feel my thoughts racing now. Can they hear me?
